traits.name: Haste
traits.desc: When in need, a cave troll is capable of startling bursts of speed. It has advantage on Dexterity saving throws and gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one claw), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The cave troll regains 6 hit points at the start of its turn. If the cave troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the cave troll’s next turn. The cave troll dies only if starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The cave troll can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cave troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 +4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage.
